markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 355 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call forth a cloud of mist. All creatures within the mist become concealed, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. You can Dismiss the cloud.
name: Obscuring Mist

summary_markdown: Conceal creatures in a cloud of mist.
text: Obscuring Mist Three Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 355 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Cast material, somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 20-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- You call forth a cloud of mist. All creatures within the mist become concealed, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. You can Dismiss the cloud.
